Wind
In southeast, variable 2 to 4, becoming easterly or northeasterly 3 to 5 for a time. In northwest, variable 2 to 4, becoming southerly 4 or 5, then backing southeasterly 5 to 7 later, perhaps gale 8 later in west.

In southeast, moderate. in northwest, moderate, becoming rough later in west.
Weather
In southeast, fair. In northwest, rain later.
Visibility
In southeast, good. In northwest, good, occasionally poor later.
